content: Venture where few have gone before by booking your stay at the White Desert Antarctica Camp. This 8-day glamping experience is filled with incredibly thrilling activities that include a private jet flight over the South Pole to check out majestic Emperor penguins.

Feel like one of the most powerful villains in the Marvel multiverse by getting your hands on this Marvel Infinity Gauntlet replica. This life-size replica is meticulously crafted with movie-accurate details and comes with its own stand so that you can proudly display it.

Help keep your precious fingers intact during any kind of dangerous jobs by slipping on these kevlar fiber gloves. Constructed from incredibly tough kevlar, they’re lightweight to facilitate movement and flexibility yet strong enough to shield against razor sharp blades.

Teach Jr. about making wise investments from an early age by using his college fund money to purchase this Ford GT40 kid’s car. Modeled after the iconic supercar, it comfortably seats two and can reach a top speed of 22 miles per hour.

Just when you thought donuts couldn’t get any tastier Krispy Kreme introduces these Nutella filled donuts! Each bite offers the sugary taste of a classic glazed donut followed by a burst of creamy chocolaty Nutella that will send your taste buds to high heaven.

Swim with dangerous crocodiles while keeping your limbs intact on this cage diving experience in Australia’s Crocosaurus Cove. The Croc Cove is a saltwater theme park with over 50,000 gallons infested with crocodiles and other beautiful but deadly marine life.

For the 50th anniversary of Kubrick’s iconic 2001: A Space Odyssey, Master Replicas is introducing the HAL-9000 virtual assistant. It will run off of an Amazon Fire HD tablet and even be able to recite famous lines from the seminal sci-fi flick.

If Batman had a SUV, the Karlmann King Bulletproof Ground Stealth Fighter would be it. This all-black 4×4 monster boasts a 6.8-liter V10 while the exterior is covered in carbon fiber and sheet metal slabs that make this vehicle a street legal urban tank.

titleEN: Rick And Morty Screaming Sun Alarm Clock
content: Sometimes you need a little more than birds chirping to wake you up in the morning. And there’s no better way to start your day than with this Rick And Morty alarm clock that will scream at you for a satisfying forty-two consecutive hours!

Pay homage to your favorite pizza-loving and sewer skating turtles with this TMNT mutagen canister prop replica. Inspired by the 1990 live action movie, this 13 inch plastic canister features movie accurate details along with overflowing slime that actually lights up.

Give your cat another reason to hate you by transforming him into an adorable fur covered veggie using one of these cat vegetable hats. The hats come in six vibrant veggie styles such as an egg plant, a carrot, a white radish, a tomato, an onion, and a corn cob.

It’s a scientifically proven fact that bubble butts provide the best neck and back support – which is why you owe it to yourself to rest your tired and lonely head on one of these life size natural latex butt shaped pillows. The Buttress pillow is comfy, firm, and come in many colors.

Greet the new day in true gamer fashion by keeping the Game Boy alarm clock on your nightstand. It’s styled just like the original Nintendo Game Boy and plays the classic Super Mario theme song instead of that infernal beep like standard alarm clocks.

Escape a life threatening situation by turning the tables on your attacker with this concealable titanium knife shirt collar. This stealthy four gram titanium/ceramic composite weapon can easily be whipped out in self defense to slash your assailant and run to safety.

Avoid becoming roadkill during your next night ride by heading out in the Faux Pas reflective cycling jacket. This lightweight thermal jacket is made with a water-resistant and windproof fabric that is highly light sensitive so your entire torso lights up.

Show your fondness for our solar system by putting these mini planetary globes on display. These to scale globes depict Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, and Uranus in stunning detail and brilliant color.

Drive responsibly with both hands on the wheel while still looking like an asshole on your cellphone with the hands free cell phone holder. It’s the must-have phone accessory for drivers who want to talk on the phone hands free while angering their fellow drivers.

It’s now possible to print an entire house! The Icon 3D printed house is part of a project that is aimed at providing low cost housing for the masses since each home can be made in just 24 hours for a fraction of the cost as a traditional house.

For the DT-30PM amphibious military vehicle there’s virtually no terrain it can’t handle. Putting all other ATV’s to shame, this mobile beast boasts an 800 HP liquid-cooled turbocharged diesel motor and tank-like treads that will traverse through almost anything.

Furrion Exo-Bioinics has ushered in a new era of mech technology with their exo-bionic racing mech Prosthesis. Weighting over 4 tons, this 15 feet tall and 18 feet wide human piloted beast is capable of stepping over obstacles and traveling at up to 20 miles per hour.

Hold dozens of classic games in the palm of your hand by playing with the RetroMini handheld gaming console. This Game Boy styled device bundles 36 games into one convenient little package that you can easily carry anywhere so that you can game on-the-go.

Are your assets getting in the way of your sport and lifestyle activities? The Boobuddy was specifically developed to reduce vertical and lateral breast movement, preventing pain and sagging, and increasing overall sport confidence!

titleEN: Iron Man Arc Reactor Smartphone Case
content: Power up your precious smartphone with endless-power from the Arc Reactor! This vibrant and high quality case will protect your iPhone and comes equipped with a fully functional LED indicator that is perfect for all comic book geeks.

Make a splash when you hit the beach or pool this summer by slipping into these color changing swim shorts. These eye-catching swim trunks are made from a special fabric that magically changes color when you jump into the cool water.

Urban Madness is the modified 1969 Ford Bronco that RMD Garage built for those who like to venture off the beaten path. It boasts a 302ci Ford V8, all-around LED lighting, a winch on the front bumper, an ax, and a jerrycan to ensure that you’re prepared for anything.

The Foiler Flying yacht delivers a smooth and luxurious ride unlike any other water craft. Powered by twin 320 HP BMW diesel engines, it tops out at 40 knots, can seat up to 7, and features retractable hydrofoils that lift the boat 4.9 feet above the water for a smooth ride.

Verner Paton’s visionary 1970 masterpiece Visiona is a futuristic psychedelic landscape composed of incredibly vivid colors and undulating curves throughout the entire structure designed to create an effect that everything is beautifully blended together.

Sleep like the burger king with the hamburger bed that comes with your choice of toppings, soda, and a side of fries. Made using only the freshest ingredients, this delicious bed will wrap you up in between its lettuce and cheese, giving you a wonderful night’s sleep.

Turn your little Imperials’ room into a scene right out of their favorite movie with this massive Imperial Walker bunk bed. This out-of-this-world bed is expertly crafted to resemble an Imperial walker that looks like it has seen its fair share of battles.

Shower your queens will affection by showing them a little love with this YASSS button. Each time you press down on the vibrant rainbow colored button this compact device cycles through a set of positive sayings like “yass queen”, “yass girl”, and “O-M-G, yass!”.

Tuck yourself into this glorious blanket which transforms into a gaming cloak, pillow, sleep mask, and much more. Made of super cozy fabric – the Tuck blanket has thumbholes, a hood, foot pockets, and a phone pocket – so you’ll never go cold during a match again.

Gain a new perspective on life when you hop aboard the Earth orbit balloon ride and ascend to the very edge of space and witness the beauty of our planet and the universe itself. This transformative experience requires no formal training, only a very large bank account.

If you love classic games, there’s no better way to protect your smartphone than using this gamer’s console iPhone case. The backside features a fully functional Game Boy inspired console where you can play games like Super Mario and Tetris.

Make the most of your home’s limited space with this convertible table and book shelf. When you need a little extra room for your dinner guests, simply loosen the locking screws, turn the shelves counter-clockwise and watch as they magically transform into an elegant table.

What better way to add some style and color to your bedroom than with this insanely comfy and vibrant faux fur beanbag? This groovy generously sized retro bean bag measures 41″ in diameter and has a long shaggy fur cover that is removable and machine washable.

Overwhelm your favorite gamer with pure joy by surprising them with this giant Kirby plush. This giant and cuddly Kirby measures approximately 24 inches tall and comes with a small pack of savory Kirby themed manju cakes.

Jersey based artist Gregory Raymond Halili utilizes his incredible artistic ability to transform run of the mill objects into eye-catching works of art. With some fine oil paint accents he’s turned these gold-lipped Phillippine mother-of-pearl shells into eerie yet beautiful skulls.

Ever wondered what your face tastes like? Well wonder no more! With these personalized face lollipops you’ll be able to enjoy snacking on an edible life size version of your face simply by submitting a picture plus a short description.

Make your childhood fantasy of solving eerie crimes a reality by transporting your team around in The Scooby Doo Mystery Machine van. This 1972 Ford was been meticulously customized to resemble the iconic cartoon van – right down to the groovy ’70s color scheme.

Witness the birth of a prehistoric creature by lighting up this hatchling dinosaur egg candle. Once the candle begins to melt under the flame, a little baby velociraptor emerges from his egg to imprint on you as the pack alpha.

Most fire-related deaths occur due to smoke inhalation. The Emergency Escape Filter is the innovative concept that looks to change that. It is designed to be placed under the nose and create an immediate link between your airways and the small filter.

To celebrate national Ranch day, Hidden Valley commissioned this stunning one-of-a-kind jewel encrusted Hidden Valley Ranch bottle that’s fit for royalty. This work of art features white gold accents and boasts 75 karats of diamonds and sapphires.

Explore one of our planet’s most scenic regions without forgoing modern luxuries by booking at stay at EcoCamp Patagonia. This ecofriendly resort is composed of state-of-the-art geodesic domes with 360 degree views of Chile’s Torres del Paine National Park.

Throw out that lame Huffy bike in your garage – the future of cycling has arrived with the light up monowheel. Unlike a traditional unicycle where the rider sits above the wheel, with the light up monowheel you sit inside the wheel for a truly unique riding experience.

Venture off the beaten path without being weighed down by a cumbersome camper by outfitting your vehicle with a Go Fast camper. It pops up in seconds, and provides a safe, cozy, and well ventilated space for two adults to sleep in.

titleEN: Emoji Stick Figure Light Up Costumes
content: Once the lights go off, these emoji stick figure light up costumes come to life! These stunning battery powered suits transform you into a real life version of the iconic emoji’s we use on a daily basis – complete with a shapely stick figure body.

titleEN: Ides Of March Julius Cesar Pencil Holder
content: Reenact the bloody murder of Julius Ceaser over and over again by stabbing the late emperor in the back – literally – with your well sharpened pencils. The bust of the infamous Roman general can accommodate up to 7 pencils – making it a perfect gift for any history buff.

Why settle for a conventional speaker when you can really make a statement with the stratospheric speakers. Inspired by early 20th century radial aircraft engines, it boasts specs like a 270-watt active subwoofer and 25-watt tweeters.

If you think the drive-in is an ideal date spot, a night at the hot tub movie theater will be truly unforgettable, no matter how bad the actual date goes. A hilarious movie on the screen, a room full of scantily clad fellow tubbers and alcohol – the ingredients to the perfect night.

Join the ranks of history’s greatest warriors by arming yourself with a samurai sword hand forged specially for you. You can customize everything from the blade material to its length before it’s forged by master sword makers using traditional methods.

Breakfast is coming! Rule over the Seven Kingdoms of Breakfasteros by placing part of your hearty balanced breakfast atop the Iron Throne egg cup. This pint-sized throne is forged from a thousand tiny fallen enemy swords.

Turn your dull fridge into your own little corner of the internet using these meme magnets. The set includes a combination of 166 letters, numbers, and punctuation magnets in the classic “meme font” so that you can turn any picture into your own custom meme.

Make your living room more stylish and inviting than ever before with the eye-catching Moooi O. rocking chair. This Marcel Wanders designer chair’s minimalist design serves as the perfect place to sit back and relax to a gentle rocking motion.

Pull up to the club in a unicycle and you’re labeled the weirdo. Pull up to the same club on the one wheel motorcycle and jaws will drop at the sight of your bad-ass ride. The innovative bike design turns heads and gives the rider an unmatched sense of freedom.

Gain a new appreciation for nature by getting a bird’s-eye view of some breathtaking vistas by paying a visit to the Camp Adventure park. The trail begins at a 900 meter long path that starts at the forest floor and ends at a spectacular 45 meter tall observation tower.

Bring your all time favorite memes to life with one of these customizable animated GifBooks. Simply paste in the URL or upload your favorite GIF to start production on your very own internet approved flipbook that can be animated by hand.

Receive a truly unique view of Neptune’s vast underwater realm while riding inside the amphibious sub-surface watercraft. With its quick transitioning design, you and three friends will be able to enjoy both under and above water vistas simultaneously.

Add some deep water beauty to your everyday life by decorating your home or office with one of these realistic glass jellyfish sculptures. Each one of these incredible glass sculptures masterfully depicts the grace and majesty of these underwater creatures.

Earn some major brownie points with your better half by surprising her with one of these incredible giant flower bouquets. Each massive bouquet contains 105 lively and colorful blooms that are guaranteed to brighten up your sweetie’s day.

The project Cecilia 165′ mega yacht is like a floating five star hotel complete with everything from hot tubs to a helipad. The master cabin features a private ocean-front terrace while the stern lends itself as an internal docking station for your spare yacht.

Carry an arsenal of life saving tools in the palm of your hands using this paracord survival grenade. The interior of this 550 paracord grenade is filled with 26 useful items such as waterproof matches, a compass, fishing hooks, and even a compressed towel.

Experience the unmatched thrill of hydroflight – even if you’re a beginner – with the Flyride Hydroflyer aerial jet ski. This fun two-seater comes equipped with a flight control system that can do everything from self balance to performing automated barrel rolls!

The 2018 Chicago Auto Show saw the unveiling of the ultimate in winter transportation – the Nissan 370Zki snowmobile. Nissan and American Track Truck teamed up to modify a 370Z roadster with wide rear tracks and large front mounted skis perfect for snowy conditions.

Getting your little tot to play outside will be easier than ever when they see this motorized dirt digger. This pint-sized motorized backhoe allows your little worker to dig up dirt and sand as they operate the fully functioning bucket hand.

Skydio R1 has reached a new level in autonomous A.I. quadcopter drone technology. This self-flying auto-follow drone uses 13 cameras to build a real time 3D map of its surroundings that includes trees, people, and buildings to effectively and skillfully avoid all obstacles.

Embark on the adventure of a lifetime by setting sail on your very own Viking ship. Each ship is built with the superior Nordic craftsmanship that made the first Vikings world renowned explorers – so you can raid and conquer distant lands to your hearts content.

Ensure you get a thorough workout the next time you hit the gym by going dressed in one of these sweat activated t-shirts. After you build up a good sweat, a motivational message appears over the front to let you know you’ve completed your grueling workout.

Make your next celebration a little more exciting than usual by trading your fancy bubbly for this eye-catching blue champagne. Instead of a pale yellow hue, this unique bubbly features an electric blue shade along with a flavorful fruity taste.

Get the most out of your two person jet ski by attaching it to the Sealver jet ski wave boat. This excellent attachment transforms your regular jet ski into a power boat in mere seconds so that you can entertain all your friends.

There’s no better way to brighten up a dark and windowless room than with this artificial skylight. It utilizes nanotechnology to simulate natural light – right down to the color and temperature – to create the convincing illusion of sunlight.

Turn heads as you barrel down the road behind the wheel of this all electric Morgan EV3. Weighing only 1120 pounds, this unique eco-friendly three-wheeler features 2 lithium batteries that can propel you up to 90 miles per hour for a range of 150 miles.

If pebbles and BBs just aren’t cutting it, this arrow firing slingbow should be the obvious weapon of choice. This eye-catching weapon features a sturdy ergonomic design that comes complemented by a small mounted flashlight ideal for shooting when visibility is limited.

Throw out the keys to your Toyota Prius and get behind the wheel of a real vehicle – because now you can drive a tank and crush puny cars beneath its incredible weight with this glorious and empowering tank driving experience!

It’s a bird, it’s a plane, no it’s you! With the personalized superhero figurines you’ll finally get a chance to save the day and become the hero you’ve always known you could be. These action figures will immortalize you and turn you into the stuff of legends.

With the Jet Capsule miniature luxury yacht, living the high life doesn’t have to cost you an arm and a leg. This pint-size yacht features superb craftsmanship and contains the exuberant amenities you’d expect while taking up a fraction of the space of an traditional yacht.

This soft sided backpack cooler is the ideal way to transport your beverages when you head outdoors. This always ready-to-go cooler features an IP-66 waterproof rating, comes in either a 20 or 30-liter capacity, and will keep ice from melting for 72 hours.

Give your living room an out-of-this-world touch by showing your support for space exploration with this Falcon 9 rocket chandelier. This imposing 3D printed chandelier is modeled on SpaceX’s two-stage Falcon 9 rocket.

The Do-C capsule hotel in Tokyo is a must if you want to experience capsule lodging in a contemporary setting. It boasts a fully refurbished modern interior along with an imported timber lined Finnish sauna to achieve a luxurious yet traditional capsule hotel experience.

Gain a deeper understanding of the vastness of the cosmos by gazing at this Megastar Class home planetarium. Despite its small size, it projects in all directions so you can see around 1 million nearby stars – and offers dusk, dawn and blue sky mood lighting.

Go from cruising over asphalt to gliding over water without having to change vehicles while riding atop the motorcycle jet ski hybrid. This versatile ride features a two cylinder engine able to hit 80 mph on land and transitions from bike to ski in just 5 seconds.

titleEN: Star Wars Death Star Pet Cave
content: Keep your furry friend happy and cozy in true Imperial fashion using this Star Wars Death Star pet cave. Modeled after the Empire’s infamous planet destroyer, it features a super soft Velboa surface and comes with a removable cushion inside for utmost comfort.

Ensure your pricey car remains safe from would-be thieves by outfitting your home with this pop-up parking garage. Apart from acting as an anti-theft measure, it shields your car from the elements while also saving you space in your driveway.

Become the envy of every sneaker head in town by getting your hands on the Adidas Futurecraft 4D sneakers. These incredibly limited kicks feature a Primeknit upper along with a special 3D printed midsole created with Digital Light Synthesis.

Show the world how committed you are to your one true love – fast food – with this stunning 18K gold Big Mac ring. Famed jewelry designer Nadine Ghosn’s one of a kind piece depicts the iconic burger in magnificent gold, with gems and seven tiers of diamonds.

titleEN: Build Your Own Mini Boat Kit
content: Become the captain of your very own vessel without draining your savings by building your own mini boat with this kit. The kit comes with everything you’ll require to build a small yet incredibly fun six foot long wooden vessel that’s ideal for the lake.

Create amazing visuals as you ride around town by lighting up the night with these battery-free bicycle lights. Every time you pedal, the lights move past the small frame mounted magnet that charges the capacitor to power the wheel mounted lights.

Get closer to becoming a real-life superhero by acquiring the actual Batpod used in the iconic Dark Knight films. Although the dual cannons have been decommissioned, this ride features a completely custom chassis and a powerful 750cc Honda motor.

Ever wondered what happiness looks like? Wonder no more and feast your eyes on this massive 85″ Samsung S9 4K UDH TV! It boasts quad-detail enhancement technology that delivers 4 times the resolution for a stunning image and immersive TV watching experience.

Shred down the slopes like a pro without having to wear a mountain of constricting clothes by hopping on one of these ski and snowboard simulators. They utilize GPS scouting to recreate any ski resort in the world and visualize it in stunning 4K resolution.

Give your better half the surprise of a lifetime during her next soak by dropping in this hidden jewelry bath bomb. Each vibrantly colored piece features a unique and delightful scent and comes with a piece of jewelry hidden inside valued anywhere between $13 to $2,700.

Show your poor tired feet some much needed love by giving them a relaxing soak inside this hydrotherapy heated foot bath. The powerful jets and circulation-boosting red light pampers sore feet and calves with a relaxing reflexology massage.

Ensure your family’s well-being in the post apocalyptic world by placing an Atlas underground survival shelter on your property. The long cylindrical design comes with a functional kitchen and bathroom, along with an air filtration system and a decontamination room.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Faux Snow
content: This glow in the dark faux snow delivers all the fun of the real thing – all year round! Simply add water and it expands to 100 times its regular size to form a white and fluffy snow substitute that will glow green once the lights go off.

titleEN: Mold & Germ Destroying UV Light Spheres
content: Make the world around you a little less germy by placing these mold and germ destroying UV light spheres in your home. These waterproof orbs utilize UV-A and 405nm blue light to combat mold, fungus, bacteria, and algae without toxic chemicals.

Kick your adrenaline into high gear when you cruise along the highway behind the wheel of the Polaris slingshot. The innovative three wheel design allows for maximum control and stability at breakneck speeds thanks to its extremely low center of gravity.

Travel in Aquaman-like fashion when you venture into Neptune’s underwater realm by grabbing a hold of this compact underwater scooter. It features a dual propeller system that allows you to swim as fast as a professional swimmer for extended periods of time.

Drone hunting falcons can be difficult to come by which is why DroneShield has developed this tactical drone gun. This rifle styled anti-drone gun can be operated by a single person and utilizes signal jamming frequencies to confuse oncoming UAVs and force them to land.

The Carver motorized electric board is the ideal go-to option for users and to enjoy the feeling of gliding above flat waters. With this electric board you will immerse yourself into a completely new and unbelievable sense of freedom.

Hold an arcade’s worth of games in a device smaller than your thumb with PocketStripe’s keychain gaming console! You’ll be able to load and play classic Game Boy, Game Boy Color, Game Gear, and Sega Master System games onto this tiny portable console!

Flowers may look and smell nice, but they taste pretty terrible. Nothing says ‘I love you’ quite like a bouquet of fresh edible donuts! You can choose from three delectable flavors – chocolate, strawberry, and vanilla – and select either an eight or twelve donut bouquet.
